sentences.en: a riding switch
sentences.cn: 马鞭

sentences.en: an important policy switch
sentences.cn: 一项重要的政策改变

sentences.en: an on-off switch
sentences.cn: 开关键

sentences.en: He didn't bother to switch on the light.
sentences.cn: 他懒得去开灯。

sentences.en: He flipped the timer switch.
sentences.cn: 他按了一下定时开关。

sentences.en: If you switch the words over, the sentence sounds better.
sentences.cn: 如果你把这几个词调换一下位置, 这句子听起来就好多了.

sentences.en: Milk rounds are threatened as customers switch to buying from supermarkets.
sentences.cn: 随着顾客转而从超市购买牛奶，送牛奶的生意受到了威胁。

sentences.en: New technology made a switch to oil possible.
sentences.cn: 新技术使得转而使用石油成为可能。

sentences.en: Next week they will swap places and will repeat the switch weekly.
sentences.cn: 下周他们将交换座位，并且以后每周换一次。

sentences.en: Prince Edward threw the switch to light the illuminations.
sentences.cn: 爱德华王子按动开关亮起彩灯。

sentences.en: She groped blindly for the light switch in the dark room.
sentences.cn: 她在黑暗的房间里摸索电灯开关。

sentences.en: Switch to paying your mortgage by direct debit.
sentences.cn: 改成用直接借记方式偿还抵押贷款吧。

sentences.en: The heating is on a time switch.
sentences.cn: 暖气靠定时开关自动供热。

sentences.en: The intercom buzzed and he pressed down the appropriate switch.
sentences.cn: 对讲机发出嗡嗡声，他按下了相应的开关。

sentences.en: The overdrive switch was on the steering column.
sentences.cn: 超速挡的开关在转向杆上。

sentences.en: the switch from agriculture to dairy production
sentences.cn: 从农业向乳品生产的转变

sentences.en: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

sentences.en: The terrorists will switch tactics.
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

sentences.en: Then her thoughts would switch to the present.
sentences.cn: 然后，她的思绪会转到现在。

sentences.en: We had to make a switch in our arrangements.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不对我们的安排作些变动.

sentences.en: Where’s the light switch ?
sentences.cn: 电灯开关在哪儿？

sentences.en: Why don't you switch the darn thing off and listen to me!
sentences.cn: 把那讨厌的东西关掉，专心听我讲话好不好！

words.tran_cn: 交换机；转换开关；调车机车

phrases.tran_cn: 光电开关；光电式开关掣

trans.tran_cn: （电路的）开关，闸，转换器，改变，转变
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that starts or stops the flow of electricity to a machine, light etc when you push it

trans.tran_cn: 改变，转变，交换，调换，调班
trans.tran_en: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another
to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another
to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another
